# Once upon a time {.unnumbered}

[**Once upon a time**, in a small town where dreams would gather, lived a young Black kid, his name was Jasper. ]{style="font-size:48px"}

[Curiosity bloomed in his heart, a flame to tether, for he wondered why his grandma wore a feather.]{style="font-size:48px"}
